title: Naturallive
author: Naturallive
content: Any information where the scammers Vladislav Alimpiev and Sebastian Sonntag working for the fraud company localbitcoins are residing?Localbitcoins.com have stolen us a huge amount of bitcoins, and we are going to bust these scammers.Looking forward to receive information about the whereabouts of these scammers.

comments.author: r34tr783tr78
comments.created_time: September 01, 2022, 07:40:32 AMLast edit: September 01, 2022, 08:15:30 AM by r34tr783tr78
comments.body: Good report. This site screams scam out loud. It was created just a few days ago hiding under privacy. I couldnt find any scam report about it yet. Domain Name: ethereumpw.orgRegistry Domain ID: b0ecb48d673c4768a95a34363501652c-LRORRegistrar WHOIS Server: whois.namecheap.comRegistrar URL: http://www.namecheap.comUpdated Date: 2022-08-17T02:07:37ZCreation Date: 2022-08-17T02:07:14ZRegistry Expiry Date: 2023-08-17T02:07:14ZRegistrar: NameCheap, Inc.Registrar IANA ID: 1068Registrar Abuse Contact Email: email@namecheap.comRegistrar Abuse Contact Phone: +1.6613102107Domain Status: addPeriod https://icann.org/epp#addPeriodRegistry Registrant ID: REDACTED FOR PRIVACYRegistrant Name: REDACTED FOR PRIVACYRegistrant Organization: Privacy service provided by Withheld for Privacy ehf

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Naturallive on August 07, 2022, 10:36:48 AMLooking forward to receive information about the whereabouts of these scammers.Just head over to Finland. I am pretty sure you will get a good head start from there. LolBut why did you even user Localbitcoin in the first place, yet there are much better p2p exchanges like bisq and localcryptos?Quote from: r34tr783tr78 on September 01, 2022, 07:40:32 AM<...>How is this information related to localbitcoins?

comments.author: LFC_Bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Naturallive on August 07, 2022, 10:36:48 AMAny information where the scammers Vladislav Alimpiev and Sebastian Sonntag working for the fraud company localbitcoins are residing?Localbitcoins.com have stolen us a huge amount of bitcoins, and we are going to bust these scammers.Looking forward to receive information about the whereabouts of these scammers.You haven’t provided any evidence of anything. I’m not sure what type of help you expect with a total lack of information.Edit - Looking at your post history it seems you say they locked your account. There still isn’t a single screenshot or shred of evidence. I’m not sure how you expect anybody to help you.

comments.author: Casino Critique
comments.body: As mentioned above by users, you need to provide enough evidences to get attention in your case by the community. In the case of losing big amount of money, my suggestion will be to work with a lawyer instead of seeking help in the forum. According to Google localbitcoins are registered in Helsinki, Finland. Find a lawyer and seek legal advice from the professionals.

comments.author: Naturallive
comments.created_time: September 26, 2022, 03:09:42 PMLast edit: September 26, 2022, 04:22:43 PM by Naturallive
comments.body: Quote from: Casino Critique on September 06, 2022, 02:29:48 PMmy suggestion will be to work with a lawyer instead of seeking help in the forum. According to Google localbitcoins are registered in Helsinki, Finland. Find a lawyer and seek legal advice from the professionals.How to find a good lawyer and how much is coasts?I dont know anybody in Finland.Also where is the scammer Vladislav Alimpiev residing? if I have friends in Finland I would ask them to go to the office and have a check.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Naturallive on September 26, 2022, 03:09:42 PMHow to find a good lawyer and how much is coasts?How is he supposed to know? I doubt if both of you are from the same Country. You will have to make inquiries around in your JurisdictionQuote from: Naturallive on September 26, 2022, 03:09:42 PMI dont know anybody in Finland.Also where is the scammer Vladislav Alimpiev residing? if I have friends in Finland I would ask them to go to the office and have a check.Even if you knew anyone from there, it's useless if you have no backing of law enforcement personnel and a court order.

comments.author: zestVI
comments.body: how were u scammed?i have coins locked they are asking for more verification
